definition: "hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to support/to sustain/to erect/to raise/branch/division/to draw money/classifier for rods such as pens and guns, for army divisions and for songs or compositions

sentences.english: The science view is changing, forming technoscience view.

sentences.english: The horse racing gathering is a great chance for guys to show off horsing skills and win a girl's heart.

sentences.english: Babcock design, supply and construct advanced boiler technology including super critical for the utility power industry.
sentences.chinese: 斗山巴布源設，供貨建設括超臨界技先鍋爐技。

sentences.english: Focusing his Ki, the Ninja uses momentum to strike the enemy with tremendous force.
sentences.chinese: 忍者可以集中“技”對敵人發動強擊。

sentences.english: You can use Limit Breaks more frequently under Aura.
sentences.chinese: 在鬥氣狀態下可以經常使用極限技。

sentences.english: Razed long division skills", it studied the Western advanced technology to enrich our country."

sentences.english: Male came walking technology area, happened to spent sleep.

sentences.english: The technique, the newspaper and the information inform the signal communication which Fan establishes cloudy.
sentences.chinese: 技，報和情報報知範陰建立的通信聯絡。

sentences.english: He always feels inferior for his lack of expertise.
sentences.chinese: 他總爲自己身無長技感到自卑。

sentences.english: Lecture : Nanotech and biological hybrid could speed computers.
sentences.chinese: 技結合生物學可加快電腦速度。

sentences.english: You're good in bed if you make us feel like stallions.
sentences.chinese: 如果你讓我們感到自己像種馬，那說明你牀技很好。

sentences.english: I said ignore the finishers, so that removes Rip and FB.
sentences.chinese: 我說過忽略掉終結技，那麼移除了割裂和兇猛撕咬。

sentences.english: Death Knights use two major Resource mechanics to do damage.
sentences.chinese: 死騎運用兩種主要癿戓技系統輸出傷害。

sentences.english: How's your golf game? The answer may tell you a lot about your health.
sentences.chinese: 足下高爾夫球技如何？這可是一個事關你健康的問題。

sentences.english: I'm a little rusty at golfing.
sentences.chinese: 我的高爾夫球技有些生疏了。

sentences.english: The mature technology ensures the machine a stable performance with good price.
sentences.chinese: 成熟的技機種，性能穩定，物超所值。

definition: various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea
to use fully/to put to use
unique skill/unexpected tricky move (as a last resort)/masterstroke/finishing blow
to bid farewell/tricks of the trade/pithy mnemonic formula (e.g. Mao Zedong's 16-character mantra 十六字訣|十六字诀 on guerrilla warfare)
stars of the Big Dipper that constitute the tail of the dipper
pose or motion of one's body in martial arts
